H0.text: where does the red wolf live in the world. Eastern China

H1.text: where does the red wolf live in the world. Northern India

H2.text: where does the red wolf live in the world. Southern Brazil

H3.text: where does the red wolf live in the world. southeastern United States

A4.text: Some evidence shows the species was found in highest numbers in the once extensive bottom-land river forests and swamps of the southeastern United States.

A5.text: Red wolves reintroduced into northeastern North Carolina have used habitat types ranging from agricultural lands to forest/wetland mosaics characterized by an overstory of pine and an understory of evergreen shrubs.
